User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap
Sitemap: https://dulitha-wickramasinghe.netlify.app/sitemap.xml

# Crawl-delay
Crawl-delay: 1

# Disallow admin routes
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /admin-login

# Allow all other content
Allow: /about
Allow: /projects
Allow: /blogs
Allow: /contact
Allow: /skills
Allow: /experience
Allow: /education

# Block common bot traps
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /_redirects
Disallow: /sw.js
Disallow: /workbox-*.js
